definition[0]: a short performance by an actor, singer etc that someone watches to judge if they are good enough to act in a play, sing in a concert etc
example[0]: I’ve got an audition for the Bournemouth Symphony Orchestra on Friday.
definition[1]: to take part in an audition
definition[2]: to watch and judge someone’s performance in an audition
example[2]: We auditioned more than 200 dancers before deciding on Carole Ann.
